law.catch_line: Kentucky Sports Authority -- Membership -- Chairperson -- Executive director -- Functions.

text.section: There is created the Kentucky Sports Authority, which shall be attached to the Tourism, Arts and Heritage Cabinet, Office of the Secretary, for administrative purposes.

The authority shall consist of fifteen (15) members, including the Lieutenant Governor, the secretary of the Tourism, Arts and Heritage Cabinet, the secretary of the Public Protection Cabinet, and twelve (12) members appointed by the Governor. The members appointed by the Governor shall include representatives of the Kentucky Horse Racing Commission, the fish and wildlife community, and the Kentucky Boxing and Wrestling Authority.

The Lieutenant Governor shall serve as chairperson of the authority. Members shall elect other officers as they deem necessary. Of the members initially appointed by the Governor, one-third (1/3) shall serve a term of four (4) years, one-third (1/3) shall serve a term of three (3) years, and one-third (1/3) shall serve a term of two (2) years. All succeeding terms shall be for four (4) years.

The secretary of the Tourism, Arts and Heritage Cabinet shall appoint an executive director, with the prior written approval of the Governor, to head the authority. The cabinet shall provide additional administrative support to the authority from the cabinet's existing staff as necessary.

The authority shall meet no less than biannually and at other times as necessary, upon the call of the chairperson. Members shall be reimbursed for expenses incurred in performing the authority's duties, functions, and responsibilities.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 138, effective July 15, 2010; and ch. 44, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 16, sec. 24, effective June 25, 2009. -- Created 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 1, effective June 20, 2005.

metadata.lrc-note: (6/20/2005). Although 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 1, contains a reference to the Kentucky Boxing and Wrestling Commission, the entity created by 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 11, which confirms Executive Order 2005-002, is the Kentucky Boxing and Wrestling Authority. In accordance with 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 11, sec. 23, the reference in subsection (2) of this statute has been changed. (7/15/2010). This section was amended by 2010 Ky. Acts chs. 24 and 44, which do not appear to be in conflict and have been codified together.
